When_Approval_Request_Date_Reviewed_by_P.description: Trigger Condition set so that this only runs for Drawdowns, Lender Settlements and Net Distributions

Compose_Confirmation_URL.inputs: Click this link to view the record in Dynamics 365

parameters.WebhookApprovalCreationInput/itemLinkDes: Please follow the link to view this Drawdown in Dynamics 365

parameters.emailMessage/Body:
Dear @{outputs('Get_Product_Team_Authoriser')?['body/fullname']}

You have Approved Drawdown Record @{triggerOutputs()?['body/ukn_reference']}

Facility:   @{outputs('Get_Facility')?['body/ukn_name']}
Fund/Delivery Partner:  @{outputs('Get_Fund_Delivery_Partner')?['body/name']}
Gross Amount:  @{outputs('Update_Approval_Request_PTA_Flow_Decision_to_Approve')?['body/ukn_grossamountrequested']}
Net Amount to Be Paid:   @{outputs('Update_Approval_Request_PTA_Flow_Decision_to_Approve')?['body/ukn_netamounttobepaid']}
Currency:   @{outputs('Get_Currency')?['body/currencyname']}
Notice Received Date:   @{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['ukn_noticereceiveddate'], 'dd-MM-yyyy')}
Payment Value Date:   @{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['ukn_paymentvaluedate'], 'dd-MM-yyyy')}
Approval Type:  @{triggerOutputs()?['body/_ukn_drawdownapprovaltype_label']}

@{outputs('Compose_Confirmation_URL')}

Dear @{outputs('Get_Product_Team_Authoriser')?['body/fullname']}

You have Rejected Drawdown Record @{triggerOutputs()?['body/ukn_reference']}.

Facility:   @{outputs('Get_Facility')?['body/ukn_name']}
Fund/Delivery Partner:  @{outputs('Get_Fund_Delivery_Partner')?['body/name']}
Gross Amount:  @{triggerOutputs()?['body/ukn_grossamountrequested']}
Net Amount to Be Paid:   @{outputs('Update_Approval_Request_PTA_Flow_Decision_to_Reject')?['body/ukn_netamounttobepaid']}
Currency:   @{outputs('Get_Currency')?['body/currencyname']}
Notice Received Date:   @{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['ukn_noticereceiveddate'], 'dd-MM-yyyy')}
Payment Value Date:   @{formatDateTime(triggerBody()?['ukn_paymentvaluedate'], 'dd-MM-yyyy')}
Approval Type:  @{triggerOutputs()?['body/_ukn_drawdownapprovaltype_label']}
Reason for Reject: @{items('Loop_though_approval_response')?['comments']}

@{outputs('Compose_Confirmation_URL')}
